<a id="BoxContainer"></a>

# BoxContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md), [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md)

A container that arranges its child controls horizontally or vertically.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A container that arranges its child controls horizontally or vertically, rearranging them automatically when their minimum size changes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **AlignmentMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode)

<a id="BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_BEGIN** = `0`

The child controls will be arranged at the beginning of the container, i.e. top if orientation is vertical, left if orientation is horizontal (right for RTL layout).<a id="BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_CENTER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_CENTER** = `1`

The child controls will be centered in the container.<a id="BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_END"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode) **ALIGNMENT_END** = `2`

The child controls will be arranged at the end of the container, i.e. bottom if orientation is vertical, right if orientation is horizontal (left for RTL layout).<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="BoxContainer_property_alignment"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode) **alignment** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#BoxContainer_property_alignment)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_alignment**\ (\ value\: [AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode)\ )
- [AlignmentMode](BoxContainer.md#enum_BoxContainer_AlignmentMode) **get_alignment**\ (\ )

The alignment of the container's children (must be one of [ALIGNMENT_BEGIN](BoxContainer.md#BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_BEGIN), [ALIGNMENT_CENTER](BoxContainer.md#BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_CENTER), or [ALIGNMENT_END](BoxContainer.md#BoxContainer_constant_ALIGNMENT_END)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="BoxContainer_property_vertical"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **vertical** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#BoxContainer_property_vertical)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertical**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_vertical**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **BoxContainer** will arrange its children vertically, rather than horizontally.

Can't be changed when using [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md) and [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="BoxContainer_method_add_spacer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Control](Control.md) **add_spacer**\ (\ begin\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#BoxContainer_method_add_spacer)

Adds a [Control](Control.md) node to the box as a spacer. If `begin` is ``true``, it will insert the [Control](Control.md) node in front of all other children.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="BoxContainer_theme_constant_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **separation** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#BoxContainer_theme_constant_separation)

The space between the **BoxContainer**'s elements, in pixels.
